summary: Want that yummy body - I got what you need!
descriptionHtml:
[center][/center][center][/center][center][/center][center][img width=242,height=247]https://s-media-cache-ak0.pinimg.com/originals/f8/34/a8/f834a8cd7edae5c9bf338834bb53853e.png[/img]
[color=#d5a6bd]
[/color][color=#B45F06][color=#cccccc][size=3]This is a preset I use for my characters and followers, no need to credit me just enjoy.[/size][/color][color=#cccccc]
[/color][b][size=4]
HOW TO MAKE IT WORK ON ARMORS:[/size][/b]
[color=#efefef][size=3]

1) Select my preset body in the preset dropdown menu.

3) Click on the Build Multiple Groups button

4) Select the armor sets you want to change (I usually do groups of about 5 at a time).[/size][/color]

[color=#ead1dc][size=3]OR.....

1. Press Save as
2. Tick in all the boxes for every armor you want it for.
3. Save as Candyfox clothes ( as a example)
4. Go to the Armor slider you want to convert and load it from the drop down list.
5. Enjoy.
[/size][/color]
[size=4][b]
Requirements:[/b][/size]

[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/2666/?]Caliente's Beautiful Bodies Edition -CBBE- by [b]Caliente_ Ousnius and Jeir[/b] [/url]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/49015/?]BodySlide and Outfit Studio by [b]Ousnius and Caliente[/b] [/url]


[/color][/center][center][b][color=#B45F06]CREDITS:[/color][/b]
[b]Ousnius and Caliente[/b][/center]
author: MassiveMaster
